name: Remy Hall
description: I’ll say I am honest, loyal, faithful, trusting, kind, caring, loving and fun to be with, a man with a compassionate and generous nature.I don’t play games with a persons heart or their feelings and I believe that honesty,trust,love and commitment are still the building blocks for a strong relationship,and someday I hope to find a woman with the same believe.I love going to the beach, movies, dinners, holding hands and taking a walk, I love rock climbing, fishing, hiking and bike riding as well as backpacking,dancing is also a hobby I’ll love to teach my one and only woman. I don’t play games with a persons heart or their feelings. I am very ambitious and intelligent, I also have a wonderful attitude about life. I have a wonderful sense of humor and i can easily adapt to most situations. I am that kind of man that will make his woman come home early. I am very secure and know how to treat a woman. You can go anywhere in the world you want to and I will always be waiting with open arms. I have a lot of love and happiness to bring to the table and even if you are flirtatious it’s ok because at the end of the day,home with me is where you would rather be. I’m that kind of guy that is not afraid to show his affection to that special woman any day anywhere anytime.
